findings.name: Password Encryption
findings.impact: Passwords stored in cleartext are visible to anyone with config access
findings.recommendation: Enable: service password-encryption
findings.output:
show running-config | include service password-encryption
IOU2#

findings.name: SSH Version 2 Only
findings.impact: SSHv1 has known cryptographic vulnerabilities
findings.recommendation: Configure: ip ssh version 2
findings.output:
show ip ssh
SSH Enabled - version 2.0
Authentication methods:publickey,keyboard-interactive,password
Authentication Publickey Algorithms:ssh-rsa,ecdsa-sha2-nistp256,ecdsa-sha2-nistp384,ecdsa-sha2-nistp521,ssh-ed25519,x509v3-ecdsa-sha2-nistp256,x509v3-ecdsa-sha2-nistp384,x509v3-ecdsa-sha2-nistp521,rsa-sha2-256,rsa-sha2-512,x509v3-rsa2048-sha256
Hostkey Algorithms:rsa-sha2-512,rsa-sha2-256,ssh-rsa
Encryption Algorithms:chacha20-poly1305@openssh.com,aes128-gcm@openssh.com,aes256-gcm@openssh.co

findings.name: Telnet Disabled
findings.impact: Telnet transmits credentials in cleartext over the network
findings.recommendation: Configure: line vty 0 15 -> transport input ssh
findings.output:
show running-config | section line vty
line vty 0 4
 privilege level 15
 transport input ssh
IOU2#

findings.name: Login Banner Configured
findings.impact: Legal warning banners establish unauthorized access policy
findings.recommendation: Configure: banner login # [warning message] #
findings.output:
show running-config | begin banner
IOU2#

findings.name: Exec Timeout Configured
findings.impact: Idle sessions can be exploited if left unattended
findings.recommendation: Configure: line vty 0 15 -> exec-timeout 10 0
findings.output:
show running-config | include exec-timeout
 exec-timeout 0 0
 exec-timeout 0 0
IOU2#

findings.name: Strong Password Policy
findings.impact: Weak passwords are susceptible to brute-force attacks
findings.recommendation: Configure: password policy strength 4, min-length 10
findings.output:
show running-config | include password policy
IOU2#

findings.name: SSH Timeout Configured
findings.impact: Unresponsive SSH sessions consume resources
findings.recommendation: Configure: ip ssh time-out 60
findings.output:
show running-config | include ip ssh time-out
IOU2#

findings.name: SSH Authentication Retries Limited
findings.impact: Unlimited retries enable password guessing attacks
findings.recommendation: Configure: ip ssh authentication-retries 3
findings.output:
show ip ssh
SSH Enabled - version 2.0
Authentication methods:publickey,keyboard-interactive,password
Authentication Publickey Algorithms:ssh-rsa,ecdsa-sha2-nistp256,ecdsa-sha2-nistp384,ecdsa-sha2-nistp521,ssh-ed25519,x509v3-ecdsa-sha2-nistp256,x509v3-ecdsa-sha2-nistp384,x509v3-ecdsa-sha2-nistp521,rsa-sha2-256,rsa-sha2-512,x509v3-rsa2048-sha256
Hostkey Algorithms:rsa-sha2-512,rsa-sha2-256,ssh-rsa
Encryption Algorithms:chacha20-poly1305@openssh.com,aes128-gcm@openssh.com,aes256-gcm@openssh.co

findings.name: NTP Authentication
findings.impact: Unauthenticated NTP can be spoofed, causing time-based attacks
findings.recommendation: Configure: ntp authenticate, ntp authentication-key, ntp trusted-key
findings.output:
show running-config | include ntp
IOU2#

findings.name: Syslog Configuration
findings.impact: Without centralized logging, security events may go undetected
findings.recommendation: Configure: logging host [syslog-server], logging trap informational
findings.output:
show running-config | include logging
logging discriminator EXCESS severity drops 6 msg-body drops EXCESSCOLL 
logging buffered 50000
logging console discriminator EXCESS
 logging synchronous
 logging synchronous
IOU2#

findings.name: SNMPv3 Security
findings.impact: SNMPv1/v2c community strings transmitted in cleartext
findings.recommendation: Configure: snmp-server user [user] [group] v3 auth sha [pass] priv aes 128 [key]
findings.output:
show running-config | include snmp
IOU2#

findings.name: Management ACL
findings.impact: Unrestricted management access from any network increases attack surface
findings.recommendation: Configure: access-list [#] permit [mgmt-network], line vty 0 15 -> access-class [#] in
findings.output:
show running-config | section line vty
line vty 0 4
 privilege level 15
 transport input ssh
IOU2#

findings.name: Logging Timestamps
findings.impact: Accurate timestamps critical for incident response and correlation
findings.recommendation: Configure: service timestamps log datetime msec show-timezone
findings.output:
show running-config | include service timestamps
service timestamps debug datetime msec
service timestamps log datetime msec
IOU2#

findings.name: HTTP Server Disabled
findings.impact: HTTP server provides unauthenticated access to device information
findings.recommendation: Configure: no ip http server
findings.output:
show running-config | include ip http
ip http server
ip http secure-server
IOU2#

findings.name: HTTPS Server Status
findings.impact: If HTTPS not required for management, disable to reduce attack surface
findings.recommendation: Configure: no ip http secure-server (unless required)
findings.output:
show running-config | include ip http secure-server
ip http secure-server
IOU2#

findings.name: CDP Global Status
findings.impact: CDP discloses device information to potential attackers on local network
findings.recommendation: Configure: no cdp run (or disable per-interface on untrusted ports)
findings.output:
show cdp
Global CDP information:
	Sending CDP packets every 60 seconds
	Sending a holdtime value of 180 seconds
	Sending CDPv2 advertisements is enabled
IOU2#

findings.name: LLDP Global Status
findings.impact: LLDP discloses network topology information
findings.recommendation: Configure: no lldp run (or disable per-interface on untrusted ports)
findings.output:
show lldp
% LLDP is not enabled
IOU2#

findings.name: Finger Service Disabled
findings.impact: Finger service can leak user information
findings.recommendation: Configure: no ip finger
findings.output:
show running-config | include ip finger
IOU2#

findings.name: Source Routing Disabled
findings.impact: Source routing can be used to bypass network security controls
findings.recommendation: Configure: no ip source-route
findings.output:
show running-config | include ip source-route
IOU2#

findings.name: PAD Service Disabled
findings.impact: PAD service is legacy and rarely needed
findings.recommendation: Configure: no service pad
findings.output:
show running-config | include service pad
IOU2#

findings.name: Port Security Status
findings.impact: Unauthorized devices can connect to access ports without restriction
findings.recommendation: Configure: switchport port-security on access ports
findings.output:
show port-security
Secure Port  MaxSecureAddr  CurrentAddr  SecurityViolation  Security Action
                (Count)       (Count)          (Count)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
Total Addresses in System (excluding one mac per port)     : 0
Max Addresses limit in System (excluding one mac per port) : 4096
IOU2#

findings.name: DHCP Snooping
findings.impact: Rogue DHCP servers can redirect traffic and perform MITM attacks
findings.recommendation: Configure: ip dhcp snooping, ip dhcp snooping vlan [vlan-range]
findings.output:
show running-config | include ip dhcp snooping
IOU2#

findings.name: Dynamic ARP Inspection
findings.impact: ARP spoofing enables man-in-the-middle attacks
findings.recommendation: Configure: ip arp inspection vlan [vlan-range]
findings.output:
show running-config | include ip arp inspection
IOU2#

findings.name: IP Source Guard
findings.impact: IP spoofing can bypass network access controls
findings.recommendation: Configure: ip verify source on access ports
findings.output:
show running-config | include ip verify source
IOU2#

findings.name: Storm Control
findings.impact: Broadcast storms can cause network-wide denial of service
findings.recommendation: Configure: storm-control broadcast/multicast level on access ports
findings.output:
show running-config | include storm-control
IOU2#

findings.name: BPDU Guard
findings.impact: Rogue switches can cause spanning-tree topology manipulation
findings.recommendation: Configure: spanning-tree portfast bpduguard default
findings.output:
show running-config | include spanning-tree
spanning-tree mode rapid-pvst
spanning-tree extend system-id
IOU2#

findings.name: Root Guard
findings.impact: Unauthorized devices can become root bridge and disrupt network
findings.recommendation: Configure: spanning-tree guard root on non-root ports
findings.output:
show running-config | include spanning-tree guard root
IOU2#

findings.name: Loop Guard
findings.impact: Unidirectional link failures can cause forwarding loops
findings.recommendation: Configure: spanning-tree loopguard default
findings.output:
show running-config | include loopguard
IOU2#

findings.name: Native VLAN Security
findings.impact: Default VLAN 1 on trunks vulnerable to VLAN hopping attacks
findings.recommendation: Configure: switchport trunk native vlan [unused-vlan] on trunks
findings.output:
show interfaces trunk
IOU2#

findings.name: Control Plane Policing
findings.impact: Control plane vulnerable to DoS attacks affecting device stability
findings.recommendation: Configure: control-plane, service-policy input [policy-name]
findings.output:
show running-config | section control-plane
control-plane
IOU2#

findings.name: CPU Protection
findings.impact: Unprotected CPU can be overwhelmed by malicious traffic
findings.recommendation: Implement rate-limiting policies for control plane traffic
findings.output:
show running-config | include control-plane
control-plane
IOU2#

findings.name: AAA New Model Enabled
findings.impact: Without AAA, centralized authentication and accounting unavailable
findings.recommendation: Configure: aaa new-model
findings.output:
show running-config | include aaa new-model
aaa new-model
IOU2#

findings.name: TACACS+ Configuration
findings.impact: Local authentication only, no centralized identity management
findings.recommendation: Configure: tacacs server [name], address ipv4 [ip]
findings.output:
show running-config | include tacacs
IOU2#

findings.name: AAA Authentication
findings.impact: No centralized authentication policy enforced
findings.recommendation: Configure: aaa authentication login default group tacacs+ local
findings.output:
show running-config | include aaa authentication
IOU2#

findings.name: AAA Authorization
findings.impact: Command authorization not enforced, users have unlimited access
findings.recommendation: Configure: aaa authorization exec default group tacacs+ local
findings.output:
show running-config | include aaa authorization
IOU2#

findings.name: AAA Accounting
findings.impact: User actions not logged for audit trail and compliance
findings.recommendation: Configure: aaa accounting exec/commands default start-stop group tacacs+
findings.output:
show running-config | include aaa accounting
IOU2#
